message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $95. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle on $90?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $90. How about we try $88? I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
